entry.title: TADA Software Architecture
entry.summary:
My PhD project involves developing a real-time controller for the Two Axis aDaptable Ankle (TADA). The software can be summariezed as follows:

Architecture Summary

Raspberry pi

  • Brain
  • Motors
  • IMU
  • Europa

Remote computer (Windows laptop)

  • Data processing
  • Xsens
  • GUI

Remote bridge: ROS over Wi-Fi

My PhD project involves developing a real-time controller for the Two Axis aDaptable Ankle (TADA). The software can be summariezed as follows:

entry.title: First post
entry.summary: Engineer with eight years of experience in embedded systems, robotics, and biomechanics. My research involves the mechanical design, the development of embedded software and motor/sensor integration, and the biomechanical evaluation of robotic prostheses for human walking. Ph.D. candidate at the University of Wisconsin-Madison, with a graduate date of â€¦
entry.content: Engineer with eight years of experience in embedded systems, robotics, and biomechanics. My research involves the mechanical design, the development of embedded software and motor/sensor integration, and the biomechanical evaluation of robotic prostheses for human walking. Ph.D. candidate at the University of Wisconsin-Madison, with a graduate date of August 2023.
